All religions. All this singing. One song. Peace be with you
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: I am in the House of Mercy, and my heart is a place of prayer
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Don’t wait any longer. Dive in the ocean, leave and let the sea be you
thinking.author: Rumi

thinking.quote: Everything happens for me, not to me
thinking.author: Byron Katie

thinking.quote: There are two ways to be. One is at war with reality and the other is at peace
thinking.author: Byron Katie

thinking.quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far
thinking.author: Swami Vivekananda

thinking.quote: A good life is a surprising life. A surprising life is one with few expectations
thinking.author: James Clear

thinking.quote: Thoughts are overrated. Intuition is underrated
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: You’re never too important to be nice to people
thinking.author: Jon Batiste

thinking.quote: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long
thinking.author: Elon Musk

thinking.quote: In a complex world, intelligence consists in ignoring things that are irrelevant
thinking.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

thinking.quote: The most important thing is to find out what is the most important thing
thinking.author: Shunryu Suzuki

thinking.quote: The game is to be where you are. Be it honestly and as consciously as you know how
thinking.author: Ram Dass

thinking.quote: When there is no desire, all things are at peace
thinking.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching, Amazon book)

thinking.quote: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves
thinking.author: Buddha

thinking.quote: We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking
thinking.author: Santosh Kalwar

thinking.quote: The mind without passions is a fortress. No place is more secure
thinking.author: Marcus Aurelius (Meditations, Amazon book)

thinking.quote: That’s life: starting over, one breath at a time
thinking.author: Sharon Salzberg

thinking.quote: Who you think you are each day, completely determines the universe you live in
thinking.author: Ram Dass

thinking.quote: Everything that has a beginning has an ending. Make your peace with that and all will be well
thinking.author: Jack Kornfield

thinking.quote: What you really value is what you miss, not what you have
thinking.author: Jorge Luis Borges

thinking.quote: You know, there are two good things in life, freedom of thought and freedom of action
thinking.author: Somerset Maugham

thinking.quote: The most important thing for learning is doing. The most important thing for success is saying no. The most important thing for happiness is saying yes
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature
thinking.author: Marcus Aurelius

thinking.quote: Thinking is easy, acting is difficult, and to put one’s thoughts into action is the most difficult thing in the world
thinking.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

thinking.quote: The greatest effort is not concerned with results
thinking.author: Atisha

thinking.quote: Embrace discomfort. That’s how you’ll learn, grow, become strong, and ultimately, become free
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: Your desire for pleasure or happiness makes you unhappy
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: Slow reading, most enjoyable reading. Slow learning, deepest understanding. Slow to conclusions, deepest thinking. Rushing can make you waste time and life
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Drop the idea of becoming someone, because you are already a masterpiece. You cannot be improved. You have only to come to it, to know it, to realize it
thinking.author: Osho

thinking.quote: If you look deeply into the palm of your hand, you will see your parents and all generations of your ancestors. All of them are alive in this moment. Each is present in your body. You are the continuation of each of these people
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: Craziness is good. Crazy people are happy, free, they have no hindrance. But since you have many attachment, you are only a little crazy. This is not crazy enough. You must become completely crazy. Then you will understand
thinking.author: Seungsahn

thinking.quote: Wisdom tells me I am nothing, love tells me I am everything. Between the two, my life flows
thinking.author: Nisargadatta

thinking.quote: Those who seek the easy way do not seek the true way
thinking.author: Dogen

thinking.quote: Neither seek nor avoid, take what comes
thinking.author: Swami Vivekananda

thinking.quote: When you become a lover of what is, the war is over
thinking.author: Byron Katie

thinking.quote: The key to everything: give yourself permission to be who you really are
thinking.author: Susan Cain

thinking.quote: We think too much and feel too little
thinking.author: Charlie Chaplin

thinking.quote: Where does a thought go when it’s forgotten?
thinking.author: Sigmund Freud

thinking.quote: We experience ourselves our thoughts and feelings as something separate from the rest. A kind of optical delusion of consciousness. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us
thinking.author: Albert Einstein

thinking.quote: Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else’s opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation
thinking.author: Oscar Wilde

thinking.quote: Presence is when you’re no longer waiting for the next moment, believing that the next moment will be more fulfilling than this one
thinking.author: Eckhart Tolle

thinking.quote: As human beings, all 7 billion of us are born the same way and die the same way. Physically, mentally and emotionally we are the same. We all want to live a happy life and avoid problems, but in a materialistic culture we overlook the importance of love and affection
thinking.author: 14th Dalai Lama

thinking.quote: Man is born free, but everywhere he is in chains
thinking.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

thinking.quote: I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think
thinking.author: Socrates

thinking.quote: Be a loner. That gives you time to wonder, to search for the truth. Have holy curiosity. Make your life worth living
thinking.author: Albert Einstein

thinking.quote: We have never arrived. We are in a constant state of becoming
thinking.author: Bob Dylan

thinking.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large
thinking.author: Confucius

thinking.quote: I never learned anything when I was talking
thinking.author: Larry King

thinking.quote: A clear rejection is always better than a fake promise
thinking.author: Zig Ziglar

thinking.quote: In order to understand the world, one has to turn away from it on occasion
thinking.author: Albert Camus

thinking.quote: The only shame is to have none
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: Don’t push the river; let the river flow
thinking.author: Arianna Huffington

thinking.quote: Act without expectation
thinking.author: Lao Tzu

thinking.quote: Ignorance is bold
thinking.author: Thucydides

thinking.quote: Direction matters more than speed
thinking.author: Shane Parrish

thinking.quote: Recognize and honor your uniqueness
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: To think for yourself, question yourself
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: You are still guided by your expectations
thinking.author: Chuang Tzu

thinking.quote: A meditator is both an artist and a warrior
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: Some lose yet gain, others gain and yet lose
thinking.author: Lao Tzu

thinking.quote: Those who stand for nothing fall for anything
thinking.author: Alexander Hamilton

thinking.quote: Talking is overrated. Listening is underrated
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself
thinking.author: Socrates

thinking.quote: Remember: eventually, no one will remember you
thinking.author: Jack Butcher

thinking.quote: Where all think alike, no one thinks very much
thinking.author: Walter Lippmann

thinking.quote: You always admire what you really don’t understand
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: The really important thing is not to reject anything
thinking.author: Susan Sontag

thinking.quote: Growth is the art of failing without self-destructing
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Think long term. Execute short term. Appreciate the present
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: A thought, even a possibility, can shatter and transform us
thinking.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

thinking.quote: If you want to cure the world, don’t emanate fear – emanate love
thinking.author: Ram Dass

thinking.quote: The fool has many thoughts, dramatize them and becomes agitated. The wise has many thoughts, ignore most of them and stay cool-headed
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: A man is literally what he thinks, his character being the complete sum of all his thoughts
thinking.author: James Allen (As a Man Thinketh, Amazon book)

thinking.quote: Look at the moon. It travels in the sky completely free, and this freedom produces beauty and happiness
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: The most important things in life are so simple: be good to people, cherish your friends and family, do what makes you happy, be present
thinking.author: Jack Altman

thinking.quote: The present moment. It’s where high performance is expressed and wisdom is revealed
thinking.author: Michael Gervais

thinking.quote: The power is in you. The answer is in you. And you are the answer to all your searches: you are the goal. You are the answer. It’s never outside
thinking.author: Eckhart Tolle

thinking.quote: Everything in your life is there as a vehicle for your transformation. Use it
thinking.author: Ram Dass

thinking.quote: No one is born with self-confidence. No one is born with a clear mind. No one is born with courage. They are all acquired. Decades of efforts. Just keep going
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: If you never write, you never think. If you never instruct, you never master. If you never give, you never bond. If you never travel, you never notice. If you never create, you never live
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Most people feel that they become more and more authentic over the course of their lives. I think that the older we get, the less we give a damn who we’re "supposed" to be
thinking.author: Susan Cain

thinking.quote: Go back and take care of yourself. Your body needs you, your feelings need you, your perceptions need you
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: Our practice is to cultivate good seeds in the soil of our mind, knowing that they will mature and bloom in their own time
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: Our quality of being determines our quality of doing
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: There are years that ask questions, and years that answer
thinking.author: Zora Neale Hurston

thinking.quote: Our deepest nature is to awaken and flower
thinking.author: Tara Brach

thinking.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day. Winnie the Pooh (A. A
thinking.author: Milne)

thinking.quote: To err is human; to admit it, superhuman
thinking.author: Doug Larson

thinking.quote: If you want your children to listen, try talking softly to someone else
thinking.author: Ann Landers

thinking.quote: I have a lot of growing up to do. I realized that the other day inside my fort
thinking.author: Zach Galifianakis

thinking.quote: Men marry women with the hope they will never change. Women marry men with the hope they will change. Invariably they are both disappointed
thinking.author: Albert Einstein

thinking.quote: As you get older, three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can’t remember the other two
thinking.author: Sir Norman Wisdom

thinking.quote: "That’s funny" is a nice way of letting someone know it really wasn’t
thinking.author: Sammy Rhodes

thinking.quote: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand
thinking.author: Emo Philips

thinking.quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member
thinking.author: Groucho Marx

thinking.quote: Fools laugh at others. The wise laugh with others. The wisest laugh at themselves
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: Always and never are two words you should always remember never to use
thinking.author: Wendell Johnson

thinking.quote: The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing
thinking.author: Oscar Wilde

thinking.quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence in society
thinking.author: Mark Twain

thinking.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company
thinking.author: Mark Twain

thinking.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night
thinking.author: Steve Martin

thinking.quote: Comfort is no test of truth. Truth is often far from being comfortable
thinking.author: Swami Vivekananda

thinking.quote: It’s okay to be alone, to be sad, to rest and repair. Really
thinking.author: Susan Cain

thinking.quote: Little things console us because little things afflict us
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: If only humanity made its loving as frequent and as detailed as its complaining
thinking.author: Philip Arnold

thinking.quote: Brief is man’s life and small the nook of the Earth where he lives; brief, too, is the longest posthumous fame, buoyed only by a succession of poor human beings who will very soon die and who know little of themselves, much less of someone who died long ago
thinking.author: Marcus Aurelius

thinking.quote: No one can see their reflection in running water. It is only in still water that we can see
thinking.author: Lao Tzu

thinking.quote: The most dangerous man to any government is the man who is able to think things out for himself, without regard to the prevailing superstitions and taboos. Almost inevitably he comes to the conclusion that the government he lives under is dishonest, insane, and intolerable. H.L
thinking.author: Mencken (Prejudices: Third Series)

thinking.quote: Money isn’t the goal. Freedom is. Kids aren’t the goal. Loving is. Talent isn’t the goal. Growth is. The goal isn’t the goal. Meaning is
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Modern medicine is more about money than about health. Modern education is more about credentials than about learning. Modern traveling is more about social signaling than about discovery
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Abundance is harder for us to handle than scarcity
thinking.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

thinking.quote: If you don’t crave for joy, misery won’t touch you. If you don’t crave for peace, nothing will disturb you
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: What makes you ‘you’? If you find this out, your life becomes an eternal celebration
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: Nothing in the world can bother you as much as your own mind, I tell you. In fact, others seem to be bothering you, but it is not other, it is your own mind
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: We are prisoners of the present, in perpetual transition from an inaccessible past to an unknowable future
thinking.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

thinking.quote: If you look for truth, you may find comfort in the end: if you look for comfort you will not get either comfort or truth – only soft soap and wishful thinking to begin with and, in the end, despair. C.S
thinking.author: Lewis

thinking.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best day and night to make you like everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight and never stop fighting. E.E
thinking.author: Cummings

thinking.quote: In a society that profits from your self-doubt, liking yourself is a rebellious act
thinking.author: Caroline Caldwell

thinking.quote: Your perspective on life comes from the cage you were held captive in. Shannon L
thinking.author: Alder

thinking.quote: The more you meditate, the more you understand yourself, the more peaceful you can be
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: What you are aware of, you are in control of; what you are not aware of, is in control of you
thinking.author: Anthony de Mello

thinking.quote: The foolish reject what they see, not what they think; the wise reject what they think, not what they see
thinking.author: Huang Po

thinking.quote: The fools have busy minds and busy calendars. The wise have quiet minds and quiet calendars. The wiser have fulfilled minds and no calendar
thinking.author: Maxime Lagacé

thinking.quote: You should be far more concerned with your current trajectory than with your current results
thinking.author: James Clear (Atomic Habits, Amazon book)

thinking.quote: Conquer the angry man by love. Conquer the ill-natured man by goodness. Conquer the liar with truth
thinking.author: The Dhammapada

thinking.quote: He who tries to shine dims his own light. He who defines himself can’t know who he really is
thinking.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

thinking.quote: Three treasures I cherish: The first is fathomless love, the second is frugality, and the third is reluctance to lead
thinking.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

thinking.quote: Continuous eloquence wearies. Grandeur must be abandoned to be appreciated. Continuity in everything is unpleasant. Cold is agreeable, that we may get warm
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: When people do not ignore what they should ignore, but ignore what they should not ignore, this is ignorance
thinking.author: Zhuangzi

thinking.quote: The way of the sage is to act but not to compete
thinking.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

thinking.quote: The future is being made out of the present, so the best way to take care of the future is to take care of the present moment. This is logical and clear
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: If you miss the present moment, you miss your appointment with life
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: There is the mud, and there is the lotus that grows out of the mud. We need the mud in order to make the lotus
thinking.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

thinking.quote: If you follow wisdom, fun follows you. If you follow fun, misery follows you
thinking.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

thinking.quote: The truly smart don’t care about looking smart. The truly rich don’t care about looking rich. The truly happy don’t care about looking happy
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Food fasting fixes the body. Thought fasting fixes the mind. Judgment fasting fixes relationships. Have the courage to get less: you will get more
thinking.author: Unknown

thinking.quote: Never assume it’s too late, but remember you don’t have forever
thinking.author: Johnny Uzan

thinking.quote: Darkness is an absence of light. Ego is an absence of awareness
thinking.author: Osho

thinking.quote: The power of man’s virtue should not be measured by his special efforts, but by his ordinary doings
thinking.author: Blaise Pascal

thinking.quote: A man who is never foolish is not as wise as he thinks
thinking.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

thinking.quote: It might sound pessimistic, but I remember one teacher saying to always live life with death on the side, the idea of remembering how precious life is. I think about it every day, like, "Wow, life will end for all of us
thinking.author: " Andy Puddicombe
